content: 3 together 4 fpdc cross st front post double_crochet cross stitch pattern notes please read the entire pattern before you start working this square up… it s always a good rule of thumb to prepare yourself for possible confusion before you start the work check out my youtube channel for the video tutorial https //youtu be/mfqzui3axvk si=ml4oxvqsz8jcnohw the square measures roughly 9 5-10 inches if you use the same materials as i do
